|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = (v7.4) |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q16CSIG; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3S28D40JTP-50; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 18:D6:C7 |oui = 18:D6:C7 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = VxWorks;5.5.1;; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (solder pads), GPIO |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.6 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, J1,, TP18,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/30/2015 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = 6935364090739 |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = soldered |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2050500519", "CA-F120" and "'''1646'''02002" (''11/2016'') :is silkscreened on the board. V2 has external fixed antenna (internal Inverted-F in V1). ==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr720n ''TP-LINK TL-WR720N'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] See also [[TP-LINK TL-WR720N]] [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-wr720n_v3 v3.0] ([https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=37912 3G]) and [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-wr720n_v4 v4.0] (CN) :(completely different devices under the very same name, :see [[TP-LINK_TL-WR720N]] v1 page for more info) ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Stock firmware=== '''wr720nv2-ru-up.bin''' bootloader at 0x68d4, kernel at 0x40114 :(LZMA 6E 00 00 80 00). [http://www.devttys0.com/2011/06/mystery-file-system/ FS] signature 4x ''owowowow'', BE32 = 1?, BE32 file count, BE32?, :40 char name, BE32 len and ofs (LZMA 5A 00 00 80 00). ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
[ TX ] ( RX ) ( GND ) ( 3.3V )
You need to solder a jumper wire between TP18 and TP28 on the back :of the PCB for TX to work. TX are logs from router to PC (-> RX on PC side), RX commands back :(3.3V to 2.5V resistor divider nearby <- TX). [https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=ru&tl=en&u=http%3A%2F%2Fportax.com.ua%2Fforum%2Fviewtopic.php%3Ff%3D34%26t%3D481 V1 repair] features PCB photos, boot log and unsuccessful flash chip / :firmware upgrade to one of MR3220. â€¢ [https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=ru&tl=en&u=http%3A%2F%2Fnetobzor.org%2Fforum%2Findex.php%3Ftopic%3D12242.0 same guy?] â€¢ [https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=ru&tl=en&u=http%3A%2F%2Fforum.tp-linkru.ru%2Fviewtopic.php%3Ft%3D5865%26start%3D30 boot log] Bootloader confusingly indicates only 8 MiB of RAM (pDmaBuf=0x80637910, buffend = 80782514), :while VxWorks kernel later allocates full 16 MiB (pDmaBuf=0x80e1c560, buffend = 80f67164). VxWorks-based [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr702n WR702N] and [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr710n WR710N] exhibit the same bug. ===VxWorks=== Tap Enter after the boot log to access VxWorks console. '''help''' or '''?''' prints commands available. :Not very useful since almost everything is hardwired, but provides some insight into inner workings. ===Full flash backup=== Set up PC for fixed IP 192.168.1.100 with TFTP server, ''wired'' connection to ''LAN'' port is required. :Start terminal at 115200 baud, issue Ctrl+C to stop auto-boot after ~1 s, then 
flash read 0 80100000 200000
tftp 192.168.1.100 put full.bin 80100000 200000
* bootloader and kernel identical to '''wr720nv2-ru-up.bin''' without 0x94 bytes header * 0x1c0000 - settings (backed up as encrypted '''config.bin''') * 0x1e0000 - LAN/Wireless MAC address (6 bytes), 0x1e0010 - WPS PIN (ASCII) * 0x1f1000 - calibration area (0x440 bytes), most important part to back up! ==Pictures==
